name: Yossi Banai
description: '''Yosef "Yossi" Banai''' ({{langx|he|יוסף ״יוסי״ בנאי}}; April 13, 1932 – May 11, 2006) was a singer, actor in film and theater, songwriter, comedian, lyricist, and Israeli theater director. He was awarded the [[Israel Prize]] for Theater in 1998 and the {{ill|Israeli Theater Prize|he|פרס התיאטרון הישראלי}} in 2004. Banai is considered one of the greatest [[Performing arts|performing artists]] in Israel.
